content: the storyteller cowl was my first pattern and is still one of my most popular it is a great pattern for showcasing both solid and variegated yarns inspired by the storyteller hat 2 by lindsey faciane of the chesapeake needle it features a mock-honeycomb stitch and half twisted ribbing find two skeins of dk yarn and watch it fly off your needles the free version of the pattern is available when you sign up for my newsletter 1 but you may purchase a pdf here on ravelry if you prefer to have a printable pdf **sizes** one size easily modifiable **measurements** circumference - 27in 67 5cm depth - 12 5in 31cm **gauge** 19 sts x 19 rounds = 4in 10cm in mock honeycomb stitch knit in the round after blocking **yarn** sample uses refracted light fiber arts - rivendell dk 246yds 225m 100g 2 skeins - colorway wheatberry to substitute use dk yarn - 370yds 338m note more yarn will be required if you modify the cowl to be deeper or wider than given dimensions or if suggested gauge is not met **needles** us 7 4 5mm 24in 60cm circular needles or size needed to obtain desired gauge **notions** one stitch marker tapestry needle scissors for questions or pattern support email info@refractedlightfiberarts com copyright november 2018 all rights reserved 1 https //subscribepage io/i9pz51 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/storyteller-hat
